title: lost a rank game lose 17LP and won a rank game gain 9LP???
body:
lost a rank game lose 17LP and won a rank game gain 9LP??? Comeon, almost season end~
Also, a game when it was 4hours ago, i won the game and there is nothing, even in matchhistory.......
so it means that game is free game or be canceled??????

replies.body: Server is currently having issues, in these cases all wins give half LP and all losses deduct 0 LP.

oh well but i still lost 17LP
whats wrong~?
